select (select count(*) from post_tbl p where p.category_tbl_id = c.id) as postCount , (select count(*) from category_tbl where category_tbl_ref_id = c.id) as refCount , c.id, c.category_tbl_ref_id, c.subject, c.depth, c.pos, c.type , c.visible, c.fold, c.count_visible, c.list_visible, c.list_count, c.created_at ,( select count(*) from category_tbl ct join post_tbl pt on ct.id = pt.category_tbl_id where ct.id = c.id or ct.category_tbl_ref_id = c.id) as totalCount from category_tbl c order by pos asc;

select pt.id, pt.category_tbl_id, pt.user_tbl_id, pt.subject, pt.content, pt.count ,pt.notice, pt.deleted, pt.thumbnail, pt.type, pt.created_at, ut.nickname from post_tbl pt join user_tbl ut on pt.user_tbl_id = ut.id where pt.deleted = 1
and ut.nickname like CONCAT('%', #{nickname}, '%')
